Use parametrized tests for testing multiple combinations of input data and chunk sizes.
Leverage pytest-mock for mocking dependencies during tests.
Implement a layer structure for organizing tests based on dependencies or modules.
Employ property-based testing with libraries like Hypothesis to test a wide range of inputs.
